title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do.
comment: No problems.

title: Great
comment: Simple,  no frills. But it works!
Love it

title: Best c25k app
comment: It is the only c25k app that works for me. It doesn't mess up. Every time you go from run to walk you hear a loud beep. This is a really good simple app.

title: Thanks!
comment: Does exactly what it says it will. No ads, really simple,  love it!  Only extra which would be great would be an alert half way through so you know how long you have to go and can turn around if necessary.
Great start

title: Great
comment: Simple, does what it says.

title: Does what it says
comment: Easy to use. Just keeps track of walk/runs with no drama.

title: Perfect for newbies
comment: So simple and just right. It helped me when I first started out jogging on a regular basis.

title: Short & sweet
comment: Simple app that doesn't require all the permissions in the world. Does everything it should. It would be nice if you could just check a day off.

title: Easy to use
comment: Super easy to use app. I love that it beeps every time and congratulates you on finishing the workout.

title: Functional, free, and easy to use
comment: I have used this app through all the training weeks and it's great.  As the description states you can listen to something else and hear momentary beeps when you're supposed to change activity from walking to running and vice versa.   The screen displays instructions if you want to glance down and read them; the screen also shows a countdown timer for how many minutes are left in your workout.   I've not noticed any significant drain on battery when using the app, so it's clean, simple and straightforward.  It is free and doesn't ask you to buy add-ons, so it's just great. I am going to start over with week 1 of the training program after a less active time, so I decided to stop by and write my review.

title: Good
comment: Beeps were hard with music but app  isvgreat!

title: Simple and excellent
comment: Would love a halfway there (turnaround) sound, and a way to selectively uncheck completed runs (without clearing all data in android's app mgr), but am more than willing to overlook these for SIIMPLE and small app footprint.  App runs so reliably in background w/ music player etc. App is is so reliable.  Best c25k I've seen. Thank you.

title: Simple, effective
comment: Runs independent of anything else, simple beeps to let you know to change. No silly login required, no useless features, does exactly what it's supposed to and nothing more.

title: Great app
comment: This is just what I was looking for. Basically a timer with alarms. Perfect.

title: It's okay
comment: App is fine, it does the job. I wish it had a half-way alert so I know when to turn around and head home. I like that it's simple and there are NO ADS to accidentally click on.

title: Easy
comment: Does what it says it does. No bells & whistles but effective!

title: Jogging again
comment: I love this app.
Please add audible human voice such as "Start Running"

title: Perfect
comment: Simple, no frills. A modified timer. Beeps to run, beeps to walk. Double beeps for done. Runs behind music app no problem.

title: Excellent app
comment: Trust the beeps they'll get you there. Best app for helping you get to that 5k run  <3 Loved it so much I've downloaded their C210K app (y)

title: Love it!
comment: This app is easy to use.

title: I really like this app.
comment: Easy to use, doesn't suck up a ton of power.  Great for my needs.   Using on my Samsung Galaxy s3.  Just installed on my Samsung Galaxy Tab 3.

title: Great App
comment: Simple interface. Does what it says on the tin.

title: Perfect
comment: Simple, no fuss app. Works great.

title: Good, but some issues
comment: Had issues where time would reset when screen orientation changes, mostly during warmup on my nexus 7.   Normally have no issues and the app performs as expected. Would be 5 stars if this issue gets resolved.

title: Simple & reliable
comment: Does the job. Not bells or whistles. Exactly what I was looking for. I can run whilst using this app, runtastic to map my route & listen to my tunes! My only concern (hence the 4 stars) is the app quite often crashes when you exit after a running session. No biggy!

title: Great c25k companion
comment: Works as advertised and is a good tool to follow the c25k program while also allowing you to listen to music and run thanks to the distinctive beeps.

title: Great for starters!
comment: The c25k program itself is great and this app is so helpful. Just turn on your favorite running music and press the start button. I was wary I wouldn't hear the beep for the transition, so I was diligently eyeing the app during the warm up. But once the first transition came, the beep was very clear. It makes the idea of running less daunting. Once you get in rhythm, its just listening to music and waiting for the beep. So happy I found this app.

title: You don't need anything else !!
comment: Does what it says on the tin, clear, ready to use, no ads, no network/data use or requirement.

title: Good job guys
comment: HTC One: Great app, especially for free. Does exactly what it's supposed to. If it had GPS tracking, distance and calorie stats it would be perfect. Still gets 5 stars from me for doing what it's supposed to and not interfering with my playlists.

title: Love this app.
comment: No fuss, no muss app. Straight forward, easy to use. Perfectly timed running/walking segments. I feel great after running. Love it!

title: Helpful
comment: The app has been really helpful! Still I was shocked yesterday when the jog jumped from 8 minutes to 20 minutes (Week 5). I was not ready for that so I modified it. Also, sometimes it pauses without warning or prompt. Still it is helpful when I train!

title: Excellent
comment: Used to run/jog without a plan, soon would get pains and give up...self confidence dented more and more each time.   C25K has made all the difference. Starting with low demand walking-jogging routines and gradually increasing the duration of jogging has built up my stamina and got me to *like* exercising - I now even jog in the rain and in the dark!  I can listen to my phone's music/radio in the background thanks to the beeps! Honest permissions too. 5 out of 5 to the developers, very grateful, THANKS!
Works as promised and truly free

title: Simple, functional, and actually free!
comment: Title says it all. No "pro" version, ads or bloat, does exactly what it says on the tin.

title: Good app!
comment: Used to get me going when I started running, does what it should. No problems with it. Would recommend this app to anyone starting out running :-)

title: Great app
comment: Simple and easy to use
simple and focused

title: Perfect
comment: Nice and simple. I used it with Run Keeper to fully track my runs, but this was perfect for keeping me on track. Just did my first 5k under 30 mins thanks to this.

title: Crashes ALL the time
comment: Crashes every time my phone goes to screensaver (blank, nothing fancy), then in re-opening it am sent back to start. Not worth the time and effort (albeit seconds) of downloading.

title: Wish it talked...
comment: Some apps tell you being walking, then jogging...it makes it easier when your phone is in your camelbak.
Simply awesome

title: works great!
comment: This is a very simple app--as advertised.  Beeps the same way every time to change the pace, so you have to remember where you are in the rotation for walking v. running.  I don't always remember, but hey--I'm out, I'm running, which is something I haven't done since college cross country, and since it prompts me, I'm less likely to find an excuse not to run.  Like other reviewers, I wish it would have a halfway point beep, and I'd love it if it would say "run" or "walk" (or alternate the type of beeping) instead of just beeping the same each time, but it's a truly simple app that works as advertised and that's good enough for me.  Tech support is great, too--I had a totally stupid question (wouldn't beep--darn media volume was off but I couldn't figure that out on my own) but the developer responded within an hour or so to my email and was very polite and helpful.  I have a Droid 4 and it works well with it.  Thanks for the app!

title: Awesome
comment: Just the FREE app one needs to get a start up. Its an awesome app.

title: Successful for 3 weeks
comment: Helping me get to my first 5k race - highly recommended!

title: Great!
comment: Thank you! Great program! Viva OpenSource :)

title: No nonsense solution
comment: No ads, no unnecessary permissions and does exactly what it says.  Couldn't ask for better!

title: Love it!
comment: Works great. I can listen to pandora, or play games while running this app!

title: Works great!
comment: This has been a great help in getting me started for my 1st 5k. Wish it had a pedometer though.

title: I like it a little
comment: I think this is a good app, but its difficult to feel it vibrate in between intervals. And I was not able to listen to my music while running the program. Last thing,  I also don't know how to get to that home page that is displayed to adjust volume of beep/vibration.. hence only three stars. Please help. ..

You can open the menu settings as follows:
1. Choose a workout day
2. Press the menu button
3. Touch the 'settings' pop-up
4. Choose 'Volume'

This app can not play music. You'll need a music app to play music. This app stays active while you pick your music.

I hope this helps. If not feel free to contact me.

title: Does what it says on the tin
comment: Really useful, no-frills app that gets the job done. Bravo! I particularly like how you can background it and listen to music at the same time.

title: Almost perfect.
comment: Just about perfect in its simplicity. I only with there was an option to mark days as completed. I've done a few without my phone, and the mission check marks bum me our :)

title: I made it!
comment: This is a great simple app. Caught me out when I got a phone call during my run and didn't manage to resume properly.

title: Only beeps
comment: I lost track of which beep was which.

title: Perfectly named
comment: Simple, reliable and effective.

title: Its perfect
comment: For those who feel this app is lacking can find another app and PAY  THEM. I love this app because its to the point,simple, and not all that unnecessary stuff added. This is for serious people who are ready to move not whine.
Works, no ads, includes a count down showing remaining run time.

title: Not Enough Settings
comment: This app is good, but needs much better settings options: INCLUDING 1) personalise the beep and/or vibration, as well as the tone & loudness + option to override phones's default bleep volume 2) option to override phone's screen timeout for the app - "keep the screen lit during workout" - useful if youre exercising on a treadmill & looking at the phone. Also, option to "flash" the screen at interval changes. 3)collapse day selection into weeks - click on week to see all workouts for that week. + background colour changes if week is finished.

title: Preferences?
comment: How do you access the settings?

title: Great app
comment: Exactly what i was looking for. Works great. One improvement would be a way to reset the check list.

title: Crashes during run.
comment: On two occasions, this app has crashed mid-run, leaving me wondering when or if it will beep to tell me what to do next.   When I'm running, the last thing I want to do is babysit my phone to make sure its working.

title: Very simple
comment: This simple app is just what I'm looking for. No graphs charts etc. Just a simple timer! No need to synch my music to the app, just need to know whhen to start jogging and when to start walking! Perfect for anyone else looking for something simple without all of the extras.
Great!
This is an awesome app. I started this program 9 weeks ago and I was barely able to run 1 min. Now I am easily doing 5ks. Thank you! Spartan Race now!

title: Just what I was looking for.
comment: Only thing missing is a special notification when half way done so I know when to turn around and head home. Thanks!!!

title: Fantastic
comment: Simple & easy to use.

title: Beep... Really... YES REALLY!!!!
comment: Simple is the perfect name for this app.... It simply is a timer that beeps and tells u to change pace.  i WAS worried i would hear the beep but that is not the case its loud enough and long enough that you can't miss it... I only gave four stars since Im only a week into the program

title: Awesome
comment: Awesome

title: not enough memory?  really?
comment: was looking forward, but it would not install - 'not enough memory' message, every time.  wth?!  no one's memory is that small.

title: Galaxy 2
comment: Won't record past w2  day 1

title: love love loved it
comment: This was the 3rd app I downloaded and the best one.  I could listen to my own music or audio book and the timer beeped when i needed to change from walking to running and I was not interrupted when I got a text or went back into my music to change tracks.  this app allowed me to complete the programme without having to think about it and without watching the time.  this is a no frill app, but very effective I would recommend it highly.  I would love to see you develop a similar  one for 5k to 10k. easy 5 star rating :)  sony ericsson xperia

title: Different tone for final segment?
comment: This app is great!  Simple, easy to use, and does the job.  If I could make one suggestion for an improvement, it would be to have a different tone sound for the end of the final walk segment of the day's run.  When the day's plan ends with a walk, if you're not a clock watcher, it's easy to mistake the final beep for "It's time to run!" It's not likely to hurt anyone, but it does mess with the program if that happens.

title: Perfect
comment: Lightweight, does exactly what I want. Perfect example of a one-function app.

title: Love it!
comment: I love that it runs in the background so I can listen to iheartradio. I wish it told me how many intervals I had left.

title: Excellent, works as described
comment: The app is fantastic, let alone for a free app, works without issues on the background, with phone locked, with other apps running (endomondo and music, for instance), I would add time elapsed/remaining, for an absolute perfect app. Thanks

title: Great app
comment: Very nice and user friendly app without bloat or adds. My only complaints are having to change my screen time out default to 30 minutes; also, if a phone call is received it automatically pauses training. Once the call is answered or ignored, you will have to resume the workout, even if your feet are still moving - this messes up the proper run/walk intervals.  Nonetheless, this is a great, free app to help a novice runner begin training to a 5k at a manageable pace.

title: Love it!
comment: Simple and easy to use, just as the name implies. There are no fancy graphs or bells and whistles, and that is fine by me. Just select the correct day and listen for the beeps, done!

title: Best C25K app
comment: -Alarm goes off reliably, even through Music player lockscreens -App is lightweight and fast

title: Love it! Please do the 10k
comment: I love this app! It is very simple to use, easy on the eye, vibrates to let me know when to run/walk and it is very helpful. Exactly what I was looking for and what I expected. Also, contacted the creator with a question and got a promptly reply in a very timely fashion - very professional. My only wish would be to have a next level of 10k available for download as I am already on week 6 and researching programs beyound c25k. Please create one!!!

title: Great app!
comment: Love this app! It beeps & vibrates so you know when to walk/jog. Its quick & easy & really helped me out :) I'm on week 5. Hopefuly I can find an app this good so I can go for a 10k

title: This works!
comment: Does everything it should. Love that you can have audible or vibrating alerts. The only complaint i have is that if someone calls my phone while im running this app it freezes and no longer times my run. You have to restart entire run.

title: Wonderful!
comment: Works better than every other c25k app I have tried. Needs a donate button.

title: Week 5 day 3
comment: I really love this app. Simple and it works. Although I think the week 5 work out might be wrong. Its seems like a large leap in progress.

title: Simple and great
comment: I wanted something to help me run and this is simple and perfect. No unnecessary features, uses little memory space in my phone and it is clear and simple to use. I run it simultaneously with music/radio and Endomondo to track my stats.

title: I love this!
comment: I had hit a wall in my running and started using this app to get over the hump. I love the beeps and the ease of use. It's simplicity is PERFECT! I love how easily my body has developed muscle memory for certain time intervals. I'm about ready for a 5k to 10k app. Please do one! Yours is the best!

title: Love this app!
comment: I tried to use a number of different C25K apps and this was the easiest one to use. It runs in the background while I play iheartradio. I would like it if it told you when you were halfway done or how many runs/walks you had left. Otherwise, it's great!

title: Love it
comment: I love I can still listen to my jams while having the alerts when to run/walk, works great!

title: Simple
comment: Love the simplicity...wish it was a little louder

title: Good app
comment: Easy and simple to use, just what I wanted

title: Great!
comment: Easy to use, small memory footprint, and I like the vibrate option for when an interval is over.

title: Excellent
comment: Simple, lightweight app that works flawlessly. It's a minor detail, but I really appreciate the developer including a detailed list of the app's required permissions with rationales in the description.

title: Best app I found
comment: I reviewed several different c25k apps and this one was the best simply because I was able to allow it to run in the background while listening to music. Great!

title: Best free C-2-5k program, one of the best of all!
comment: Simple c25k is very simple to use and really works well.  I've tried several of the other free C2k apps, and this is the only one I've found that has:  sufficient volume that I can hear notifications while it's in my pocket and has never had a problem with timing my jog correctly  On the issues side:  Although it doesn't have GPS, I use another program for distance tracking concurrently, which works for me.  I would like it if I could manage the volume for the app from within the app, but for some reason when I try to adjust volume within Simple C25k, it adjusts "Ringer volume" and not "Media volume", so I have to go to a different program. This may be my device (HTC Evo 3d).  The only real issue I have with Simple C25k is that I wish it went up to 10k! Otherwise it's really been the perfect app for me these past 7 weeks.  Thanks, Roel Blaauwgeers!

title: Simple app
comment: I like the simplicity of the app, it just says when to switch from a run to a walk.  Would give 5 stars if you could keep track of how far along you are and how many sets you have left.

title: So far, so good!
comment: I started using this app just this week and really like it so far. I do wish the tones were a little louder though. I listen to electronic type music while walking/running and the tone sorta blends into the music. It would be nice if there were separate audio adjustments for the app tone and the music. I need to look, but is there an apple version of this app? This would be great on my iPod touch instead of my heavy android phone!

title: Stop working with 2 min left .
comment: This app sux. It stops working with a couple of min left. Then it won't restart. I have to shut my phone down and just to restart this stupid app.

title: Great App!
comment: Wish it would let me know how much time I had left. It's a pain to keep having to look at my phone while running. Works in background with Pandora! Like that it beeps when its time to.switch walking and running.
Runs in background. Works with music. needs to tell how much is left in work out. Thank you! I really appreciate this app.

title: Does what is supposed to
comment: Nothing fancy, but gets the job done without making you pay for more weeks or whatever. Good app.

title: Works with music!
comment: Runs in the background, works with Pandora. Will beep and vibrate with the music playing. I would suggest incorporating a feature that tells you how much longer you have to go (either how many run/walks are remaining or how much time is remaining).

title: Week 1 runs off
comment: Stops after 6 repeats of the run 1 min walk 90 seconds, should have 8 repeats. does run properly in the background
